Posts.Content: Hi, sorry to hear your news. In Devon you have to be seen by 2 weeks from docs visit and seen in 4 weeks. I had my operation in less than 3 weeks. They give me an appointment after each session. Even my 2 operation was booked in before I knew I had to have one. Ring Monday. Sending you a hug x
Posts.Title: treatment plan appointment cancelled

Posts.Content: So sorry to hear your news, I'm also sorry I can't comment as have just had the operation last Monday to remove my right nipple and limp glands. But wanted to say carry on writing on here. Fantastic site and their is always someone to give you support. What ever you decide stay positive. Sending you healing and hugs x
Posts.Title: Second primary cancer just diagnosed

Posts.Content: Well done and congratulations to u and your buddy x
Posts.Title: Thursday/Friday chemo kitties

Posts.Content: Hi everyone Got any advice for this night sweats doc gave me some pills, but as yet no help. Xxx
Posts.Title: night sweats

Posts.Content: Hi Mena I couldn't have described it better. U have to laugh, what us women go though.  Mens playing with r boobs, then the give you an anti sickness they plays and tickles your lower parts, and second days after chemo got a face like a beetroot. Happy day's.  X
Posts.Title: prickly bum

Posts.Content: Hi,  Had my first chemo today, the staff were lovely and I had an experience I can't describe called prickly bum anti sickness drug. Made me laugh so much. Also tomorrow I have to inject myself that will be interesting.  Many thanks for your kind messages and support Sharon xx
Posts.Title: prickly bum

Posts.Content: That's lovely, so happy for you. Know that pathetic feeling on the sofa. Big hugs x
Posts.Title: Just had a nice surprise

Posts.Content: Hi Just wanted to send u a big hug and wish u luck for Tuesday. You never stop feeling your children's sorrow, but at the moment u have to put yourself first for a change. None of us r superheroes, and that goes for r hubby. My Ian lost 8lbs in weight waiting for my results, once he knew I had cancer he copied and is coping brilliantly. Sharon xx
Posts.Title: I just feel so angry with my self & everyone else

Posts.Content: Hi, wanted to let all of you know, there is a shinning light at the end of the tunnel. Had operation in January. Chemotherapy and radiotherapy after. I finished 3weeks ago. My hair has grown back, covered all over, I have eyebrows and eyelashes. My taste buds r back and I feel good. Blood results normal and bone scan above middle line.   To all of you beautiful, brave people stay positive, and believe you can do this. Sending u healing and hugs xx
Posts.Title: finished

Posts.Content: Hi Benja Sorry I can't help you with your worry, just wanted to write to say  sending you healing and hugs good luck x
Posts.Title: New lump!

Posts.Content: Hi I have had surgery first on my 9 day and have full movement in arm. It's tender but didn't need any painkillers after3 day. If u have been through chemo you will be ok. I have chemo next. Not looking forward to that. Good luck xx
Posts.Title: Nervous

Posts.Content: Hi, I had my first chemo 13 day's ago, like u I was scared of the unknown everyone is different,  but all I can say is it's manageable.  My second and third days were my worse.  It was like I had a hangover luckily I had no sickness.  7&8 days I had a sore mouth which I used salt water. I decided to have my hair shaved last Saturday,  as I didn't want my hair falling out. My hubby and family love my new look with scarfs and wigs. For the past few days I feel fine, my next chemo is next Thursday.  I had a picc line put in. I also have a drug nicknamed prickly bum anti sickness drug before my chemo.  I think of chemo as a roller coaster,  you can't get of it, go with the flow and each day is different.  Wishing you lots of luck and sending u healing and a big hug. Sharon xx
Posts.Title: not having a good day :(

Posts.Content: Hi, I had my first chemo 13 day's ago, like u I was scared of the unknown everyone is different,  but all I can say is it's manageable.  My second and third days were my worse.  It was like I had a hangover luckily I had no sickness.  7&8 days I had a sore mouth which I used salt water. I decided to have my hair shaved last Saturday,  as I didn't want my hair falling out. My hubby and family love my new look with scarfs and wigs. For the past few days I feel fine, my next chemo is next Thursday.  I had a picc line put in. I also have a drug nicknamed prickly bum anti sickness drug before my chemo.  I think of chemo as a roller coaster,  you can't get of it, go with the flow and each day is different.  Wishing you lots of luck and sending u healing and a big hug. Sharon xx
Posts.Title: not having a good day :(

Posts.Content: Good luck and sending you healing and hugs, I start my chemo in 2 weeks. X
Posts.Title: Starting FEC T today

Posts.Content: Hi  Sorry to hear your news, positive is your letting your feelings out and were here to hear them. Stay strong and I'm sending you hugs and healing. Together we can beat this. Xx
Posts.Title: Hospital stay

Posts.Content: Hi Lolo, I was diagnosed in January and have had 2 operations and ready to start chemo in a couple of weeks, just to let u know we on this site we are  all here for each other and feel free to ask any questions or say how you are feeling,  as u can guarantee someone is going though or been though the same. Wishing you lots of luck for Monday, and sending you healing x
Posts.Title: newbie

Posts.Content: Hi Neet Yea I think we r if in agreement hopefully we can support each other. Hope today went ok for you, any tips? Today my scarfs arrived by  post. Shed a few tears hope I look better in the wigs. Going to b a long summer. Have you had an operation yet. I have had 2. First I had my nipple removed and lypum glands, 2nd to get clear margins. I have to have 6 sessions of chemo, then 30days of radiotherapy. Yeppppppp. keeping fingers cross I will stay postive and beat this horrible thing. Sharon sending you a hug and well done for 2day.
Posts.Title: Pre chemo check

Posts.Content: Hi ctrigg Congratulations for getting half way, I'm due to start 1st on Friday,  any tips ? Waiting game is awful.  Bad enough waiting for the operation,  but pleased to say healed well. Best wishes for next 3. Sharo
Posts.Title: 3rd fec half way

Posts.Content: Hi neet I have my pre chemo and picc line put in next Wednesday.  Start chemo next Friday 13th. As far as I know they will show me the room and expain how it all works.  also choose my wig. Blood tests I will have aswell. Already signed the consent forms ,examination after the operation's have been done, Sorry I can't be more help, but wishing you good luck. Sharon
Posts.Title: Pre chemo check

Posts.Content: Hi meet, wanted to wish u good luck for this week. Here we go again.3rd one reaching the top of the hill. Hope u have been ok. I have been the same as last time. Except got mouth ulcers this time not nice. Can't stop my left eye watering pain in the ads. Going to see if anyone has any suggestions. Had a good weekend. Went to London for the weekend. Trying to arrange something for weekends before chemo. Going to Somerset next time. Picc line has been ok no problems so pleased with that.  Shaved the rest of my hair off 2 days ago. Still got lashes and eyebrows. And I had to shave my legs before going to London.  What about you. Sending u a big hug and healing for this week xxx Sharon
Posts.Title: Pre chemo check

Posts.Content: Today I had my second op to hopefully get clear margins. Had to laugh was asked to do a pregency test again after only 3 weeks. Of having lypum glands and nipple removed. Also received letter to see chemo consultant on 26th feb. Still getting alot of achy feelings in my arm  but must say staff at torbay hospital r fantastic.  Ready for a good night's sleep now sending you all healing x
Posts.Title: fingers crossed
